title: What Is Web Development? A Simple Explanation
excerpt: A beginner-friendly explanation of web development, how it works, and why businesses need it.

seo.title: What Is Web Development? (Simple Guide for Businesses)
seo.description: Learn what web development is, how it works, and why it matters for businesses in India.

content.text: Web development refers to the process of building and maintaining websites.
For businesses, a website is often the first point of contact.
